<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>Vaccines cause autism.
Organic food is always healthier than conventionally grown food.
Fossil fuels will run out within the next 10 years.
Wind and solar energy can replace all fossil fuels.
All religions are equally true.
All art is subjective and there is no such thing as good or bad art.
Taxes do not have any negative impact on economic growth.
Guns are the cause of all violence and banning them will eliminate crime.
Humans are not naturally competitive, but rather cooperative.
All animals are equal to humans and should have the same rights.
Natural remedies are always safer and more effective than prescription medication.
Climate change is solely caused by human activity and can be completely reversed.
Capitalism is inherently evil and socialism is the only moral economic system.
The gender pay gap is solely due to discrimination and has nothing to do with individual choices or career paths.
All people of color are oppressed and disadvantaged in society.<COMPLETION_END>
